description: Lists all the security configurations visible to this account, providing their creation dates and times, and their names. This call returns a maximum of 50 clusters per call, but returns a marker to track the paging of the cluster list across multiple ListSecurityConfigurations calls.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfigurations
nested_items.description: The creation date and time, and name, of each security configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the security configuration was created.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve. Include the marker in the next ListSecurityConfiguration call to retrieve the next page of results, if required.
